orgverse:
जगतः पितरौ वन्दे पार्वतीपरमेश्वरौ।
वाल्मीकेर्मुनिश्रेष्ठं रामकार्यार्थसिद्धये॥
translation: I bow down to the two parents of the universe, Parvati and Parameshwara (Shiva), for the fulfillment of the work of Rama; and the sage Valmiki, the best of Munis, for the attainment of success in the task of composing the story of Rama.
